entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.2.1183
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Clean branch name to remove slashes by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6530
  • Bump version to 4.0.2 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.1.1168...v4.0.2.1183

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.3.1413
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6668
  • Bump version to 4.0.3 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6672

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.2.1408...v4.0.3.1413

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.4.1491
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Fixed: Cleanse BHD RSS key in log files by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6673
  • Fixed: Path parsing incorrectly treating series title as episode number by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6682
  • Fixed: Deleted episodes not being unmonitored when series folder has been deleted by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6683
  • Fix incorrect subtitle copy regex and extra file script import by @JeWe37 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6640
  • Specify widely supported display mode for PWA by @cuki in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6674
  • Add info box to custom formats modal by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6675
  • Fix typo by @tillkruss in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6670
  • UI change to show a footnote to indicate episode title/series title/release group truncation is supported by @fireph in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6647
  • Fixed: Sending ntfy.sh notifications with unicode characters by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6684
  • New: Set 'Release Type' during Manual Import by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6685
  • Fixed: Skip move when source and destination are the same by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6687
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6676
  • Fixed: Improve AniList testing with Media filters by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6690
  • New: Option to prefix app name on Telegram notification titles by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6691
  • Add DevContainer and VSCode config by @joshka in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6695
  • New: Auto tag series based on tags present/absent on series by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6696
  • Fixed: Renaming episodes for a series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6697
  • New: Detect shfs mounts in disk space by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6700
  • Prevent multiple enumerations in Custom Formats token by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6702
  • Fixed: Changing Release Type in Manage Episodes by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6707
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6698
  • New: Parse absolute episode numbers within square brackets by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6708
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6713
  • Improve release notes for main releases by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6712
  • Bump version to 4.0.4 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6720

New Contributors

  • @cuki made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6674
  • @tillkruss made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6670
  • @fireph made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6647
  • @joshka made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6695

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.3.1413...v4.0.4.1491
